page.title: 11 INDUSTRY IN LEWES
page.content: Where once{heavy industry:Phoenix iron foundry,and{primary processing: cement works,were important,Lewes' new {industrial estates}do manufacturing: engineering,printing, nappies.But the {distribution of goods}is also a prime function-wine shipping, antiques exporting,packing medicines.Cliffe Estate,already employs 155 where the cement works once employed 62. Some{older industries}remains- Harveys is the sole survivor of 9 privious Lewes breweries.Baxters Printer is important in a County town. Gosnells soap factory supplies Paris Hotels.More recently,Clothkits began with 2 Lewes art students and now sends kitform clothes around the world.Moss's skirt factory moved here to escape the Blitz.Lewes organ makers supply the world.Intermedia is a brand new flourishing computer firm.
